entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as asking a question about Harry's broom.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as being nervous but excited for the Quidditch match.

entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: The Gryffindor team is mentioned as setting off for the locker rooms.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is mentioned as a school that the Gryffindor team played against in a previous match.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as possibly being in the crowd watching the Quidditch match.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt broom is mentioned as Harry's broom.

entities.name: quidditch robes
entities.description: Quidditch robes are mentioned as the clothing that Harry will wear for the match.

entities.name: stadium
entities.description: The stadium is mentioned as where the Quidditch match will take place.

relationships.description: The Gryffindor team will play at the stadium.
Harry wonders whether Professor Lupin is in the crowd watching the match.
